msg_initializing_text: Initial configuration provided by a remote server.
msg_initializing_fail_recommendation: Check the URL is correct and accessible.
msg_initializing_success_recommendation: This Battlestation is now fully operational.
text_config_play_message: This configures the system to use a test server. You can't break anything or lose any valuable data, so you don't have to worry.
text_config_play_postscript: While you play around, interface hints are turned on, and tutorials are offered where available
text_config_production_message: This configures the system to use the production PressGang server. Your edits will be live and public.
text_config_production_postscript: You need an account on the production server, and I'll need to get your username and some other details from you.
button_init_wizard_production: I'm ready to go into Production >>
button_init_wizard_playing: I want to Play and Learn >>
text_deathstar_what_is_it: What is this Death Star thing?
text_init_config_intro_message:
How would you like to use this system?

I can configure this system for Learning or for Production use.
text_init_config_postscript: Don't worry: you can change it any time later.
welcome_to_the_dark_side: Welcome to the Dark Side. This Death Star is now operational.
text_deathstar_description_intro: Topic-based authoring in the browser appliance
text_deathstar_description:
A black box virtual appliance for topic-based authoring in the browser.

It has lots of robots who do things that robots can do, leaving you to focus on creating content.

Under the Hood:

  • Publican
  • CSProcessor
  • PressGang Component Content Management System
  • Node.js
  • Meteor
nav_option_1_desc: Read and edit books you have checked out.
nav_option_1_nobooks_desc: Read and edit books in your browser. To get started, check out an existing book for editing, or create a new book.
nav_option_2_desc: Search existing books and check them out for editing.
nav_option_3_desc: Create a new topic-based book with an easy-to-use guided wizard.
nav_option_4_title: Publish a book to the stage
nav_option_4_desc: Publish your book to the internal stage for review.
nav_option_5_title: Add a book to a product
nav_option_5_desc: Add a new book to a product - get the right Brew setup, and a Bugzilla component for public feedback.
nav_option_6_title: Publish a book to the Internet
nav_option_6_desc: Publish your book to the public-facing documentation site as a part of a product release.
